channel.title: Help with pots
channel.description:
Alright none of my pots work =[
Im not sure how to make them work could someone please copy and paste there code on here because im not sure how to make them work the pots I want working are.
Super defence (4) 2442 Superattack (4) 2436 sarabrew (4) 6685 rangepot (4) 2444 praypot (4) 2434 mage pot (4) 3042 superstr (4) 2440 antipot (4) 2446
so has anyone got the correct code to make these pots work please post I would be very greatful!

item.title: Help with pots
item.dc:creator: @redrover redrover
item.description:
@redrover wrote:

        case 161: // super str (1)
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(229, 161, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 159:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(161, 159, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 157:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(159, 157, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 2440:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(157, 2440, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 113:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.aaa = c.cba / 2;
            c.abc2 = c.aaa + c.cba;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(115, 113, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 115:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.aaa = c.cba / 2;
            c.abc2 = c.aaa + c.cba;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(117, 115, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 117:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.aaa = c.cba / 2;
            c.abc2 = c.aaa + c.cba;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(119, 117, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

        case 119:
            c.strPot = true;
            c.strPotTimer = 90;
            c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.cba = c.abc / 10;
            c.aaa = c.cba / 2;
            c.abc2 = c.aaa + c.cba;
            if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
                c.abc2 = 2;
            }
            c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
            c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
            c.sendFrame126("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006);
            c.ReplaceItems(229, 119, 1, 1);
            c.setAnimation(0x33D);
            c.updateRequired = true;
            c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            c.GoOn = false;
            break;

That are Superstr and strength Remove C.

item.title: Help with pots
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Right, for sara brews to work first open client.java and search:

case 385: //Shark

And under:

healing[3] = -1; break;

Add:

[code] case 6685: //sara brew
setAnimation(829);
healing[1] = 20;
sendMessage(“You drink some of your foul liguid.”);
deleteItem(6685, GetItemSlot(1), 1);
addItem(6687, 1);
break;

case 6687: //sara brew
setAnimation(829);
healing[1] = 20;
sendMessage(“You drink some of your foul liguid.”);
deleteItem(6687, GetItemSlot(8555), 1);
addItem(6689, 1);
break;

case 6689: //sara brew
setAnimation(829);
healing[1] = 20;
sendMessage(“You drink some of your foul liguid.”);
deleteItem(6689, GetItemSlot(8556), 1);
addItem(6691, 1);
break;

case 6691: //sara brew
healing[1] = 20;
setAnimation(829);
sendMessage(“You drink some of your foul liguid.”);
deleteItem(6691, GetItemSlot(8557), 1);
addItem(229, 1);
break;[/code]

To change what it heals, change the 20 in this: healing[1] = 20;
To whatever you want it to heal.

Read full topic
